title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Yi Jou (Ruby) Liao
text:
Hi friends! :^)
I’m currently a Computational Research Assistant at the Graeber Lab, where I’m part of a project characterizing recurrent ovarian cancers. I also assist the UCLA Metabolomics Center with quality control and exploratory data analysis of mass spectrometry metabolomics data.
Previously, I graduated from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) in 2022 with a BS in Computational & Systems Biology with a Concentration in Data Science. Check out my CV for more of my background.
In my free time, I enjoy listening to music (pop/k-pop/indie/electronic), playing video games (simulation/sandbox/story-driven), and figuring out ways to optimize my personal workflow efficiency.
